dct_title_s: Bancroft's map of the Pacific States
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
Includes distance chart and "Facts and statistics."
Scanned raster image of original: 1 map on 4 sheets : hand col. ; 153 x 125 cm.
Original in the David Rumsey Collection; scanned by Cartography Associates.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
